snippet.title: Monster Trux Extreme: Arena Edition (PS2 Gameplay)
snippet.description:
Monster Trux Extreme: Arena Edition (PS2) - Vehicle: Doom - Cup: Bronze

Race well and claim victory against your opponents to earn prize money, which you can use to unlock extra Trucks and if you're really good, the ability to race down the gullies and through the canyons at night! You'll be racing huge V8 powered Monster Trucks around rugged man-made indoor tracks, which are home to the fiercest and most monstrous truck races known to man! Monster Trux Arena utilises an ultra-realistic physics system to ensure every bump, nudge, crash and crunch on the race track affects your vehicles as it should. Those who are good enough can face up to the infamous Monster Trux Arena Challenge -- an extended four-stage battle against the computer players, victory in which will unlock further Challenge cups and more powerful engines to power all your vehicles? Monster Trux Arena - Special Edition allows you to play against a friend, either in single races or competing together in Challenge mode. Will you be bashing your friend off the track and zooming through the winning posts in first place!
